content.rendered: We don’t use any fillers any emulsions. All our hams are hand-made from the finest full-muscle meats. Our butchers carefully curate the parts and then manually spice and wrap them. That’s why, you can see that each one of our hams has a unique shape. Smoked, Roasted, Oven Baked, Cooked. Choose which ham suits you best. Seven options for seven days of the week.
